p: Based on the single-factor study, the optimized experimental conditions for maximum extraction of essential oil from C. citronella leaves using supercritical CO 2 were determined using the design-expert V8.0.6. Given the influence of the above variables, the extraction processing of essential oil was optimized with a Boxâ€“Behnken design (BBD) and response surface methodology (RSM) [ 13].
